product_name: Genuine Innovations SecondWind Mini Carbon Pump / C02 Inflator
long_description: Small and lightweight, the combination SecondWind(TM) Mini Carbon Pump and CO2 Inflator from Innovations will keep your tires up and running. Fully controllable CO2 tire inflation along with a high pressure hand pump built right in makes this the only pump/inflator you'll need to carry. Works with threaded CO2 cartridges and Presta valves only. Pump can also be used to manually inflate tires; CO2 cartridge stores in handle when not in use and doubles as handle extension for manual inflation. Carbon fiber wrapped barrel. Mounts to water bottle cage braze-ons. Includes one 16g threaded CO2 cartridge.
short_description: Small and lightweight, the combination SecondWind(TM) Mini Carbon Pump and CO2 Inflator from Innovations will keep your tires up and running.
